JoozdLog 0.1.0 nl.joozd.logbookapp.PREFERENCE_FILE_KEY App Link intent Filter FlightNumber Date Airport Name Aircraft Search Continue Skip Retry Clear Add Flight Destination Origin Time Out Time In Name PIC Other names Remarks Simulator Time PICus Simulator PIC Save IFR Dual Instructor Username Auto Values Takeoff day night departure arrival Landing Autoland Total Times Edit Aircraft Co-pilot Paper Logbook Search Names Name Add This Remove last Select Search Airports Set This Times Times / Functions Augmented crew Crew Size Landing in seat Takeoff in seat Time for takeoff/landing DUAL Augmented Saved flight Deleted flight Undo New Flight Registration Signature PF Sim Sign Save to PDF> Syncing Flights… SearchAircraft Loading Airports Sign in Password "••••••••" New User Landings ➔ Settings Error Never Log In INSTRUCTOR Done! Create cloud sync account Almost done! Working… Cannot connect to server You need an internet connection for this. Cannot connect to server The server cannot be reached. It may be down, or your internet may have problems. Please try again later. Login Error Saved username/password cannot log in to server. Please try to login first Waiting for server No internet connection available. You can create and account in the settings screen when you have one, or you can connect to the internet now and retry. Server seems to be unavailable. Please retry to create an account at a later time via the settings menu. Cannot connect to server. Login data has been stored but not checked with server. Password cannot be empty Username cannot be empty Passwords do not match Wrong username or password Password requirements At least 6 characters, two of which are not the same. Password does not meet standards. It needs a length of at least 6 and at least 2 different characters. Password does not meet standards. This username is already taken. This username exists, and you have entered the correct password for it. If this is not you, please pick another username and a more secure password. If your login is still working on this device, you can change it to something you catually can remember via the settings screen, or you can generate a login link. Use this Calendar Sync conflict You are editing a planned flight while calendar sync is enabled. This means all changes will be gone by next sync. Do you want to disable calendar syncing until after this flight? You are trying to delete a COMPLETED flight. This might be illegal. Delete anyway? You are deleting a a flight from your calendar. Do you want to disable calendar import? Until end of flight You can start calendar synchronizing again by re-enabling it in the Settings menu Use IATA airports identifiers Use ICAO airports identifiers Get planned flights from your device\'s calendar Use Calendar Sync Calendar Sync Add Balance Forward Name of old logbook Multipilot time Total time of flight Day ldg Night ldg Night time IFR time PIC (+ PICUS) Co-pilot time Dual time Instructor time Balance Forward You are loading a roster file, but calendar sync is enabled. Do you want to disable calendar sync? Until end of roster Receiving data Reading file getting flights from roster Removing old flights Inserting new flights Writing data to storage XXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Repeat password Already have an account? Sign in Sign out You cannot recover your password! Don\'t forget it! I forgot my password anyway :( Make a new account Skip this step Don\'t want to use cloud sync? Create new account You are signed in as %1$s. You are not signed in. You need to be signed in before you can perform this action. I accept the terms and conditions You must accept the terms and conditions to use Cloud Sync Don\'t lose your password. You cannot restore it. I already forgot :( Cloud Sync terms Calendar Import You can import flights from your device\'s calendar. This will look for entries like \"KL1234 AMS-LCY" in whatever calendar you pick. Apart from these entries, none of your calendar contents are being saved or transmitted. Do you want to enable this? Use Calendar Import Using this on multiple devices might lead to performance problems, so don\'t do that Use Cloud Sync Cloud Sync Save old times as remarks Synchronize flights across multiple devices or easily migrate to a new device Last synchronized at: %1$s Disabled until %1$s %1$s days Enable now Monthly Overviews Monthly Overviews import supported for selected carriers (currently only KLC) only. Just share your PDF with Joozdlog. General preferences pertaining to (automatic) logging and times. Signed in as
%1$s  Not signed in Augmented Crew takeoff/landing time
%1$s minutes  Remind me to make a backup every
%1$s  Backup now Pick backup interval In case of an augmented crew (3 or more pilots), Joozdlog calculates the time that can be logged for copilots by subtracting this amount of time for each takeoff and landing, allocating the remaining time evenly over the pilots, then adds this time again for every takeoff/landing performed in the pilot\'s seat. Change Password Create a login link Login link copied to clipboard! Joozdlog Login Link This will create a login link that you can paste in your favorite app (email, sms, notepad, anywhere). If you click that link, it will try to log you in with the username/password currently set on this device. You can use this screen to change your password when you are logged in. Just enter the new password twice and you are good to go. New Password Logging Preferences ••••••••••
